beta.header: Ta strona internetowa jest w wersji BETA. Jeżeli potrzebujesz pomocy albo chcesz zgłosić jakiś błąd napisz <discordLink>na serwerze Discord mmattDonk</discordLink>.
beta.weekDisclaimer: There was a bug in the week of 01/30/2023 that caused new users to not work, please try signing out and signing back in to fix this issue.

404.title: Znalazłeś sekretne miejsce.
404.description: Niestety, jest to tylko strona 404. Możliwe, że błędnie wpisałeś adres, lub strona została przeniesiona pod inny adres URL.
404.link: Zabierz mnie z powrotem na stronę docelową.

Landing.heading: The first <gradientText>100%</gradientText> free AI TTS service for <twitchText>Twitch</twitchText>
Landing.description: AI TTS Donations is a free and Open Source AI TTS service for Twitch. It's the first of its class, no subscription services, no additional add-ons, and no ads.
Landing.getStartedTooltip: Nie jesteśmy jeszcze gotowi! Zaloguj się do listy mailingowej niżej.
Landing.getStartedToday: Brzmi dobrze? Zacznij z Donacjami AI TTS już dziś za darmo!
Landing.getStartedDesc: Join the over 1000+ streamers already using AI TTS Donations, and get the best TTS around, for free!
Landing.featuresHeading: Features that are <gradientText>unrivaled</gradientText> compared to anything else available.

features.freeDesc: All features in AI TTS Donations are completely free. No fees, and no subscriptions. Simply sign in, setup, and use. No payments required at all.
features.openSourceDesc: AI TTS Donations is completely open sourced under the 'AGPL-3' licence. You can view the Source Code and contribute to it on the GitHub page.
features.voicesDesc: AI TTS Donations is built using the APIs of <UDLink>Uberduck.ai</UDLink> and <FYLink>Fakeyou.com</FYLink>. This means that you have access to THOUSANDS of public voices on BOTH of these websites, and your audience can use them to create amazing TTS messages.
features.voiceEffectsDesc: AI TTS Donations has the ability to add voice effects and sound effects to your TTS messages. Voice effects can allow your viewer to pitch up/down voices, add reverb, reduce quality, etc.
features.soundEffectsDesc: Sound effects can add a variety of noises to your viewer's TTS messages. Your viewers can create amazing TTS messages using these features.

FAQ.heading: Często Zadawane Pytania
FAQ.q1: Where can my viewers learn how to use the new TTS?
FAQ.a1: We have a wiki entry to help your viewers get started with using the new AI TTS syntax. It's available on <githubLink>GitHub</githubLink> and you can use the shortlink (<shortLink>https://mmatt.link/UseTTS</shortLink>) to put in Twitch panels or chat commands.
FAQ.q2: Where can I get help with setting up AI TTS Donations?
FAQ.a2: You can join the <discordLink>Discord server</discordLink> and open a ticket and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Landing.dontBelieveDesc: Wystarczy spojrzeć, co mówią o tym streamerzy.
Landing.testimonyCTA: Are you a streamer that uses AI TTS Donations? Give us a review <link>here!</link>

Footer.description: making free and open source software for all streamers to make Twitch more fun!
Footer.support: Want to help support the development of Solrock? You can support us on <patreonLink>Patreon</patreonLink> or by a <discordSubLink>Discord Server Subscription</discordSubLink>!

Dashboard.adDisclaimer: this is a non-paid advertisement meant to recommend new streamer tools, thanks!
Dashboard.sensitiveInfoWarning: OSTRZEŻENIE: NIE POKAZUJ LINKU DO NAKŁADKI NA TRANSMISJI. ZAWIERO ON SENSYTYWNE INFORMACJE.
Dashboard.ttsOverlayDescription: Tutaj twoje audio TTS będzie grało, po prostu skopiuj link i wklej go do Źródło Przeglądarki w twoim preferowanym programie do streamingu (jak OBS).

configuration.blacklistDescription: Use a new line for every entry. (Example: Forsen <Kbd>Enter</Kbd> Batman)
